channel.title: [NEED HELP] RSPS Creating a Cheat Client
channel.description: Hey! First off, before I say anything please don't reply and be like "Oh, you're hacking on a rsps! Learn to play right!" Please none of that it's your option to view this... but to the point i need help, I am a coder, but i don't know how to do this, okay so i have a cheat pannel for a cheat client and i was wondering how i could get it on another cheat client... What files would i have to transfer, would i have to completely remake it? or... yeah, also If theres anyone who would want to help me code or help me with this subject add my skype, teh.milky don't you dare ddos me cause my skypes in the open :P

item.title: [NEED HELP] RSPS Creating a Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

your best bet is to decompile their client, or find the open source version of the client their server is based off of.

you then have full control over what you add.

you can send packets of any sort with the data you choose, and see which work and which don’t.

most server owners fail to check their packets properly, so this is the quickest and easiest way,

Read full topic
item.source: [NEED HELP] RSPS Creating a Cheat Client

item.title: [NEED HELP] RSPS Creating a Cheat Client
